attributes.action: Bring Pharrell Williams on tour to the East Midlands
attributes.additional_details:
Hello. We (the people of the East Midlands) want to see Pharrell Williams perform live on tour, in our region, maybe at the Capital FM Arena.

We feel the East Midlands is the perfect place for Pharrell to come on tour, as it says in our name, we're in the middle - it's easily accessible for most people in the country.

Pharrell's one of the coolest people in the world right now and has recently enjoyed a lot of success in the charts, by collaborating with Daft Punk and Robin Thicke, as well as with his solo single, Happy.
